topic.title: Site Administration
topic.section: This journal management and publishing system is designed to be installed and administered on a local Web server. Once installed, the site administrator can use it to generate as many journal sites as our required.

Open Journal Systems needs to be downloaded from the Public Knowledge Project Web site to a Web server. The current requirements for the server are spelled out on the download page for OJS. OJS does come with an installation script which takes the systems administrator for the Web server through the installation process.
